message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10000. Given its high quality and uniqueness, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $12000. This price reflects not only the value of the product but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a slightly elevated cost. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to accept $12000. Would you consider lowering the price to $10000? I believe this would allow us to reach a fair agreement.
